scripts.render:build:public: corepack pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --prod=false && corepack pnpm -C apps/public run build
scripts.dev:api: dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-env PORT=3103 npm -w apps/api run dev
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k "dotenv -e .env.local -- npm -w apps/public run dev -- -p 3100" "dotenv -e .env.local -- npm -w apps/staff run dev -- -p 3101" "dotenv -e .env.local -- npm -w apps/user run dev -- -p 3102"
scripts.dev:all:with-api: concurrently -k "dotenv -e .env.local -- npm -w apps/public run dev -- -p 3100" "dotenv -e .env.local -- npm -w apps/staff run dev -- -p 3101" "dotenv -e .env.local -- npm -w apps/user run dev -- -p 3102" "dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-env PORT=3103 npm -w apps/api run dev"
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm --dir packages/db exec prisma migrate dev
